description: Java class implementing a mock device cluster for zigbee level control, including attribute management and command handling.

classes.name: MockLevelCluster
classes.description: A mock cluster representing a zigbee device's level control, managing level attributes and handling commands.

methods.name: MockLevelCluster
methods.description: Constructor initializing the level cluster with EUI64 and endpoint ID, setting up attributes.

methods.name: handleCommand
methods.description: Handles incoming commands identified by command ID, specifically including move to level with on/off command.

methods.name: setLevel
methods.description: Sets the device's level and reports the change through an attribute report.

methods.name: setOnLevel
methods.description: Sets the on level attribute and reports the change.

methods.name: getOnLevel
methods.description: Returns the current on level value.

methods.name: getAttributeData
methods.description: Retrieves attribute data based on attribute info, serializing values into byte array.

methods.name: setAttributeData
methods.description: Sets attribute data based on received payload, updates internal state and returns status.
